name: Gothic
notes:
Install directmusic in Winetricks.

If you can't change resolution ingame. You have to edit the GOTHIC.INI in drive_c/Program Files/Piranha-Bytes/Gothic/system/

For example to:
  zVidResFullscreenX=1280
  zVidResFullscreenY=800
  zVidResFullscreenBPP=32

files.patch: N/A: Select patch to 1.08k downloaded from http://www.worldofgothic.de

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/Piranha-Bytes/Gothic/system/gothic.exe
files:
- patch: 'N/A: Select patch to 1.08k downloaded from http://www.worldofgothic.de'
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: gothic.ico
- task:
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: patch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
